Reviews.Title: Fantastical
Reviews.Author: Falatin
Reviews.Content: The most phenomenal color in both range and depth, I have ever known of.There aren't enough outputs in the back. Having only one Audio output is problematic for people who desire more freedom.Plus all of the input and outputs require the included adapters, except for the HDMI plugs.The adapters are strange, non-standard and unalike from eachother.These adapters "cannot" be found in stores as well.Oh, and you "can" turn off the motion plus feature. This feature speeds up all programs running through the television. It's so very annoying. Some feeble attempt to make it seem more real or something.If you can hook the television up without breaking anything and then leave it alone, you will be very impressed with the picture quality.Every movie you have ever watched will need to be re-watched on this television.I am so happy with this television that I actually feel guilty when just listening to movies while doing other things.By the way, you can save $500.00 by purchasing this television at Costco.

Reviews.Title: No Amazon VOD
Reviews.Author: me too
Reviews.Content: TV is loud when you turn it off.  User interface bad.  No Amazon VOD and it's 2013.  I don't think Samsung is going to allow the ap on this tv

Reviews.Title: Crystal clear images + good sound
Reviews.Author: Y. Torres
Reviews.Content: I have read a lots of review about how bad is the sound in LED TV, but this one is not in that group. For TV shows you don't need to turn on your home theater system, just change the sound mode in the menu. And the images of this TV are crystal clear. If you want to play games you have to select that mode in the menu because if not it will reacts with lags.Other plus, it include the WiFi USB device.The only CONS is that Netflix doesn't work.When it get the upgrade firmware it will show you the Netflix channel but when you select it, it will give you an error message. But because I bought a Panasonic Blue Ray with apps I have no problems with Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Lousy TV
Reviews.Author: Ignats "Ignats"
Reviews.Content: LCD went bad after a few months. The unit crackles for eternity on warm up and cool down. Samsung still has no Amazon instant video App for this model. VERY DISAPPOINTED

Reviews.Title: Needs Amazon Apps
Reviews.Author: Df
Reviews.Content: Attention people who want to stream video through the apps on the tv: It has the Netflix App. It works. But NO AMAZON STREAMING VIDEO APP. Please Amazon, include your app to be downloaded. It can't be that difficult can it?

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, but no Amazon Video (Samsung Apps are difficult)
Reviews.Author: Peter Pisciotta "Peter P"
Reviews.Content: This TV does NOT support Amazon/Prime Video streaming nor does it have a Web Browser!!!! You are confined to the apps Samsung filters and presents to you (Accuweather, Pandora, HSN, BBC, etc - none of the interfaces I viewed were as good as iTunes Apps). Loadibng the apps is painful - a web/PC interface would be nice in place of the remote. It does have Hulu and Netflix (one of them may have insisted Samsung redact Amazon - who knows!). NOTE - this is as of 11/29/2011 - it's possible that Samsung will update available Apps to include Amazon at some future time.Otherwise, a nice (albeit expensive TV). You can download a iPhone app for the remote which is also cool. For me, I refuse to pay $850 for a TV that is not 100% current, and this one is not.FYI - Costco has this TV in a 240hz version for $839.

Reviews.Title: Have it for 10 months and Going great!
Reviews.Author: rpv
Reviews.Content: I have this TV for almost a year and it is going great. The TV is stunning, lightweight. Have several HDMI ports and USB ports. I can connect USB harddisks and watch movies/pictures. It can play high resolution WMV files. It cannot play 1080p wmv files, but 720p files. This is not a big deal for me as I can always play a  blu ray or 1080p DVD. I have this connected to a Yamaha RX 571 receiver, a Blu Ray player and also a VCR. I have also connected to a OTA antenna. It looks elegant and picture quality is good. I don't use the SmartTV that often. I rely on a Google TV or my Panasonic Bluray apps. without a QWERTY keyboard, all of the smart apps are difficult to navigate and search. Overall Highly recommend Samsumg LED TV!

Reviews.Title: very limited apps
Reviews.Author: Lou
Reviews.Content: I did not wish to purchase a TV with internet apps but the Samsung has a great reputation.The TV is great but don't buy this TV for the Internet capability. It does not support Amazon Prime which has the best value for movies, etc vs. Netflix/Hulu. I purchased this in March and there is still no indication of Amazon support. The Samsung registration page DOES not work. I called support and they were supposed to complete the serial number registration but I still get emails to complete the process? I would not buy another Samsung product.

Reviews.Title: Terrific TV and excellent service
Reviews.Author: Anne Brown "beachpianist"
Reviews.Content: I bought my Samsung Smart TV from Amazon and have had it for 2 wks. now.  The picture is wonderful and the fact that it is 46" instead of 37" is terrific.  I am pleased with both the product and the quick service in shipping.  I would buy another TV from Amazon.
